column4: Could someone help me get direct rending working?  I ran the reconfigure of the xserver, but that didn't work.
Radeon 9600
Edgy?
Yes.
composit disabled ?
You know, I remember doing that the first time, but didn't see that in the instructions I followed this time.
It should have been if the instructions were for Edgy, what instructions did you follow?
https://help.ubuntu.com/6.10/ubuntu/desktopguide/C/graphics-cards.html
That guide is out of date, for future reference wiki.ubuntu.com always has good guides, you need to add these lines to the end of your xorg.conf:
Oh wait, that is help.ubuntu.com, strange ?
Yeah... those instructions were from the wiki ;)
This just requires a restart of X, right?
Yup
Okay... I'll be back if this doesn't do it.  Thanks :)
That worked beautifullly.  Thanks, bud.
when / how does it crash?
Every time I log out of a user.  White screen, mouse locked... keyboard locked.
I need to restart every time.
Can you get to a tty?
What is TTY?
It is a terminal you can use when X crashes
ctrl+alt+F1 to get to it, ctrl+alt+f7 to get back to X
Yes, it is very possible that it is only X that has crashed
